26a294d2267135b4ace7b4ebd25cbcb1.text: you look around and it appears you are in a porta-potty. The floor is slightly damp and you hear water trickling in the distance. A deactivated furby sits to your left.

36bb518d441fa4beaf467a0d65f10d0c.text: reaching into your pocket you find: you have three toothbrushes, a ball gag, and a slightly moist sword.

start.text: you wake up in an empty room
